feed.title: Authentik Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2025.4.1
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2025.4#fixed-in-202541

What's Changed

  • website/docs: add gateway API to release notes and documentation (cherry-pick #14278) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14298
  • ci: cleanup post uv migration (cherry-pick #13538) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14297
  • website/docs: initial permissions: fix usage of term admin (cherry-pick #14300) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14302
  • brands: fix CSS Migration not updating brands (cherry-pick #14306) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14308
  • website/docs: docs about initial perms (cherry-pick #14263) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14282
  • rbac: fix RoleObjectPermissionTable not showing add_user_to_group (cherry-pick #14312) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14334
  • outposts: fix tmpdir in containers not being set (cherry-pick #14444) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14449
  • lifecycle: fix ak dump_config (cherry-pick #14445) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14448
  • web/flows/sfe: fix global background image not being loaded (cherry-pick #14442) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14450
  • core: bump h11 from 0.14.0 to v0.16.0 (cherry-pick #14352) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14472
  • core: fix session migration when old session can't be loaded (cherry-pick #14466) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14480
  • root: temporarily deactivate database pool option (cherry-pick #14443) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14479
  • root: backport SFE Build fix by @BeryJu in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14495
  • enterprise: fix expired license's users being counted (cherry-pick #14451) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14496
  • core: remove OldAuthenticatedSession content type (cherry-pick #14507) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14509
  • core: fix unable to create group if no enable_group_superuser permission is given (cherry-pick #14510) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14521

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2025.4.0...version/2025.4.1

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2025.6.0
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2025.6

What's Changed

  • web/admin: prevent default logo flashing in admin interface by @dominic-r in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13960
  • core, web: update translations by @authentik-automation in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14243
  • lifecycle: fix test-all in docker by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14244
  • website/integrations: adds missing trailing slash in homarr doc by @dewi-tik in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14249
  • website/integrations: homarr remove redirect uri comment by @dominic-r in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14252
  • web: fix bug that was causing charts to be too tall by @kensternberg-authentik in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14253
  • core: bump astral-sh/uv from 0.6.16 to 0.6.17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14266
  • website/docs: add device code flow instructions by @dewi-tik in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14267
  • rbac: add name to Permissions search by @gergosimonyi in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14269
  • website/docs: update 2025.4 release notes by @melizeche in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14251
  • docs/website: Update 2025.4 notes by @melizeche in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14272
  • website/docs: Password Uniqueness Policy by @melizeche in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13686
  • website/docs: Revert "website/docs: revert token_expiry format in example blueprintâ€¦ by @melizeche in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14280
  • website/docs: docs about initial perms by @tanberry in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14263
  • website/docs: add postgres pool configuration by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14060
  • website/docs: add LDAP 'Lookup using user attribute' docs by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13966
  • website/docs: sessions in database by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13507
  • website/docs: Release notes 2025.4.0 by @melizeche in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14281
  • website/docs: add gateway API to release notes and documentation by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14278
  • ci: cleanup post uv migration by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13538
  • core: bump astral-sh/uv from 0.6.17 to 0.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14294
  • core, web: update translations by @authentik-automation in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14273
  • release: 2025.4.0 by @melizeche in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14299
  • website/docs: initial permissions: fix usage of term admin by @dominic-r in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14300
  • web: bump API Client version by @authentik-automation in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14301
  • website/docs: clarify some points (i.e. around capitalization after colons) by @tanberry in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14290
  • website/docs: clarify 2025.4 breaking Reputation changes by @gergosimonyi in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14284
  • brands: fix CSS Migration not updating brands by @BeryJu in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14306
  • website/docs: clean up oauth redirect paragraph by @fheisler in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14291
  • website/docs: adds webfinger doc under oauth provider by @dewi-tik in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14247
  • website/docs: "Device code flow" documentation improvements by @LucaTheHacker in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14257
  • website/integrations: improve Gitea doc by @dewi-tik in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14194
  • website/integrations: youtrack document by @dominic-r in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14264
  • lifecycle/aws: bump aws-cdk from 2.1012.0 to 2.1013.0 in /lifecycle/aws by @dependabot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14318
  • core: bump github.com/redis/go-redis/v9 from 9.7.3 to 9.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14317

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2025.4.2
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2025.4#fixed-in-202542

What's Changed

  • lifecycle: fix arguments not being passed to worker command (cherry-pick #14574) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14620
  • sources/scim: fix all users being added to group when no members are given (cherry-pick #14645) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14666
  • ci: fix broken cache (cherry-pick #14725) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14792
  • core: Migrate permissions before deleteing OldAuthenticatedSession (cherry-pick #14788) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14791
  • website/docs: clarify 2025.4 breaking Reputation changes (cherry-pick #14284) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14869
  • website/docs: fix dry-run release highlight (cherry-pick #14337) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14870
  • website/docs: fix leftover placeholder in release notes (cherry-pick #14377) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14871
  • website/docs: release notes for 2025.4.1 (cherry-pick #14526) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14872
  • website/docs: release notes for 2025.4.2 (cherry-pick #14868) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14873

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2025.4.1...version/2025.4.2

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2025.6.1
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2025.6#fixed-in-202561

What's Changed

  • website/releases: order new integrations alphabetically (cherry-pick #14850) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14876
  • website/release notes: add tailscale to new integrations (cherry-pick #14859) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14877
  • website/integrations: tailscale (cherry-pick #14499) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14908
  • website/docs: rotate supported versions: 2025.6 (cherry-pick #14856) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14906
  • web/user: fix user settings flow not loading (cherry-pick #14911) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14930
  • providers/proxy: add option to override host header with property mappings (cherry-pick #14927) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14945

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2025.6.0...version/2025.6.1

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2025.6.2
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2025.6#fixed-in-202561

What's Changed

  • website/docs: add 2025.6.1 release notes (cherry-pick #14948) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14949
  • stages/email: Only attach logo to email if used (cherry-pick #14835) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14969
  • web/elements: fix dual select without sortBy (cherry-pick #14977) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14979
  • internal/outpost: fix incorrect usage of golang SHA API (cherry-pick #14981) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14982
  • brands: fix custom_css being escaped (cherry-pick #14994) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/14996
  • core: bump django from 5.1.9 to 5.1.10 (cherry-pick #14951) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/15008
  • core: bump django from 5.1.10 to 5.1.11 (cherry-pick #14997) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/15010
  • website/docs: also hide the postgres pool_options setting (cherry-pick #15023) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/15032
  • providers/rac: fixes prompt data not being merged with connection_settings (cherry-pick #15037) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/15038
  • web/elements: fix typo in localeComparator (cherry-pick #15054) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/15055
  • website/docs: correct minor version in release notes (cherry-pick #15012) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/15068
  • website/docs: remove commented out config options (cherry-pick #15064) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/15067
  • core: fix transaction test case (cherry-pick #15021) by @gergosimonyi in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/15070
  • website/docs: release notes for 2025.6.2 (cherry-pick #15065) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/15069

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2025.6.1...version/2025.6.2
